About Us

Mission

We see a future of education which is (i) personalized, (ii) efficient, and (iii) delivered through futuristic devices. This is going to get achieved when the human arts of story telling and perspective sharing are weaved skillfully with meticulous strategies for data-modelling, visual-design and AI driven decision making. We are chasing this future.

Team

The team comprises of graduates from IIT Bombay and ISB Hyderabad. We are self learners ourselves and for stress-bursting, shop for courses in Coursera and Udacity. Our conviction stems from our collective experiences in self-teaching and succeeding at tough exams of the world like IITJEE, IES, GMAT, FRM, CFA (level 2) and programming certifications. If you'd like to get in touch, drop in an email at lucidlearning314@gmail.com. We promptly reply to every correspondence we recieve.
